price: 24 à Pharaon, Haman et Coré qui le traitèrent de magicien et d’imposteur.
arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَقَٰرُونَ فَقَالُواْ سَٰحِرٞ كَذَّابٞ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: ilā fir'ʿawna wahāmāna waqārūna faqālū sāḥirun kadhābun
